CustomField.description: True when invoice is past due and not in a terminal status (Paid, Cancelled, Written Off).
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Paid")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Written Off")), NOT(ISBLANK(Due_Date__c)), Due_Date__c < TODAY() )
CustomField.label: Is Overdue
